#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define x first
#define y second
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const int SIZE = 1e4+1;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
//set<string> stp;
int n,k;
int x,y;
int totWt;
//int dp[SIZE][2];
ll *a;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int tt;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    while(tt--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        a=(ll *)malloc(n*sizeof(ll));
        ll mn=INT_MAX;
        ll tot=0LL;
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            scanf("%lld",a+i);
            tot+=*(a+i);
            mn=min(mn,tot/(i+1));
        }
        printf("%lld\n",mn);
        free(a);
    }
    return 0;
}
